fko.chessly.player.computer.Omega

Class OmegaMoveGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.chessly.player.computer.Omega.OmegaMoveGenerator

  • public class OmegaMoveGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The move generator for Omega Engine.
    It generates pseudo legal and legal moves for a given position.
    This class is not thread safe as it uses static variables to avoid generating them during each object creation.
    Author:
    Frank Kopp

    • Method Detail

      • getNextPseudoLegalMove

        public int getNextPseudoLegalMove(OmegaBoardPosition position,
                                  boolean capturingOnly)
        Returns the next move of the current generation cycle.
        This method uses an on-demand generation of moves starting with potentially high value moves first to improve cut off rates in AlphaBeta pruning and therefore avoiding the cost of generating all possible moves.
        The generation cycle starts new if the position changes, capturingOnly is changed or if clearOnDemand() is called.
        Parameters:
        position -
        capturingOnly -
        Returns:
        int representing the next legal Move. Return OmegaMove.NOMOVE if none available

      • resetOnDemand

        public void resetOnDemand()
        Reset the on demand move generation use by getNextLegalMove(). The move generation cycle resets automatically if a new board position is used. Calling this method resets it manually.

      • streamLegalMoves

        public java.util.stream.IntStream streamLegalMoves(OmegaBoardPosition position,
                                                   boolean capturingOnly)
        Streams all legal moves for a position.
        Legal moves have been checked if they leave the king in check or not. Repeated calls to this will return a cached list as long the position has not changed in between.
        This method basically calls getPseudoLegalMoves and then filters the non legal moves out of the provided list by checking each move if it leaves the king in check.
        Parameters:
        position -
        capturingOnly - if only capturing moves should be generated for quiescence moves
        Returns:
        legal moves

      • getLegalMoves

        public OmegaMoveList getLegalMoves(OmegaBoardPosition position,
                                   boolean capturingOnly)
        Generates all legal moves for a position. Legal moves have been checked if they leave the king in check or not. Repeated calls to this will return a cached list as long the position has not changed in between.
        This method basically calls getPseudoLegalMoves and the filters the non legal moves out of the provided list by checking each move if it leaves the king in check.
        Attention: returns a reference to the list of move which will change after calling this again.
        Make a clone if this is not desired.
        Parameters:
        position -
        capturingOnly - if only capturing moves should be generated for quiescence moves
        Returns:
        reference to a list of legal moves

      • streamPseudoLegalMoves

        public java.util.stream.IntStream streamPseudoLegalMoves(OmegaBoardPosition position,
                                                         boolean capturingOnly)
        Streams all moves for a position. These moves may leave the king in check and may be illegal.
        Before committing them to a board they need to be checked if they leave the king in check. Repeated calls to this will return a cached list as long the position has not changed in between.
        Parameters:
        position -
        capturingOnly -
        Returns:
        list of moves which may leave the king in check

      • getPseudoLegalMoves

        public OmegaMoveList getPseudoLegalMoves(OmegaBoardPosition position,
                                         boolean capturingOnly)
        Generates all moves for a position. These moves may leave the king in check and may be illegal.
        Before committing them to a board they need to be checked if they leave the king in check. Attention: returns a reference to the list of move which will change after calling this again.
        Make a clone if this is not desired.
        Parameters:
        position -
        capturingOnly -
        Returns:
        a reference to the list of moves which may leave the king in check

      • hasLegalMove

        public boolean hasLegalMove(OmegaBoardPosition position)
        This method checks if the position has at least one legal move. It will mainly be used to determine mate and stale mate position. This method returns as quick as possible as it is sufficient to have found at least one legal move to see that the position is not a mate position. It only has to check all moves if it is indeed a mate position which in general is a rare case.
        Parameters:
        position -
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one legal move
